sentences.english: We enter the temple of the God of wealth will feel the feeling of beautiful decoration.

sentences.english: I would suggest that you specifically sell your soul to the demon king Mammon.

sentences.english: Those who set out to serve God and Mammon soon discover that there is no God.
sentences.chinese: 同時侍奉上帝和財神的，很快就會發現上帝沒了。

sentences.english: I wish I were rich as Plutos.

definition: Tai Sui, God of the year/archaic name for the planet Jupiter 木星[Mu4 xing1]/nickname for sb who is the most powerful in an area
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
god of longevity/elderly person whose birthday is being celebrated
Spring Festival couplet (the first line of which is pasted on the right side of a doorway at New Year, and the second on the left side)
the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
